para.text: Starting with version 1.3, RSS Bandit allows deleting individual feed items. To delete an item, simply select the item and press the "Delete" key. You may also right click the item and select "Delete" on the context menu.
Deleting an item places it in the new Special Feed named "Deleted Items" as in Figure 1. Items remain here until you empty the bin by right clicking it and selecting "Delete Items".

para.text: RSS Bandit allows the user to set an option to automatically delete posts older than a specified number of days. For example, RSS Bandit can be set to delete all posts older than 30 days.

There are two places where this setting applies. One is a global setting that applies to all subscribed feeds. Likewise, individual feeds can be configured to override the global setting on a per feed basis.
